title: I got banned for doing nothing
body:
I have an account in Oceania for years, but now I moved to America. Today I wanted to log in my account in Oceania to see if I can transfer to the American server, but I found that my account was banned by using third-party software. I never use any third-party software for the game, and I don't have any those kind of software in my laptop. 

I also checked my match history, there was a four games history on 8/16/2019. However, I never log in this account since June. It seems someone hacked my account and play games with the third party software. I also checked the history that the guy played four games with another player called "Behind You", that definitely wasn't me. 

I don't know what to do but I really want my this account back. I got friends and spent money on it, all memories. 

Can someone help me to deal with this issue? Thanks a lot! {{sticker:cass-cry}}

replies.body: Something similar happened to me today, just a an hour or two ago, tho i actively play and have not been inactive(was actually playing earlier today!!). This is my OP.gg: https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Drag0nHatcher  . As you can see my latest two matches are out of the ordinary for my KDA and for the champs i have played recently(I have only played Irelia 4 times this season and that is not including the game that it says i played and got insanely high kills in), hope we both get our issues resolved and i would recommend making a ticket just like i did.
message the support team and you can recover your account and get unbanned if you can prove you're the original owner
Thanks, bro! Do you know how to message them? I could not find any link online so I ask here. I would say the customer service riot made is so bad...

> [{quoted}](name=stan6,realm=OCE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oVwk2U6b,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-11-18T17:07:46.521+0000)
>
> Thanks, bro! Do you know how to message them? I could not find any link online so I ask here. I would say the customer service riot made is so bad...

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
same dude, I just called someone a %%%%%% r%%%%% and got banned permanently
Send a support ticket to riot explaining what happened and asking for investigation. This has been happening fairly often, and they can usually return your account after verifying what happened.
